subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Guilty Pleas From Oxycontin Pharma Execs
body:
The Connecticut-based maker of the powerful painkiller OxyContin and three 
of its current and former executives pleaded guilty Thursday to misleading 
the public about the drug's risk of addiction.



Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
